summary: A comprehensive test suite that verifies the functionality, configuration handling, and robustness of a Conditional DETR object detection model, covering initialization, attention mechanisms, backbone variations, forward passes with auxiliary losses, token embedding resizing, multi‑GPU execution, gradient tracking, and generation behavior.
business_intent: Ensure the Conditional DETR implementation works correctly across diverse scenarios to guarantee reliable performance in production object detection pipelines and support continuous integration testing.
